title: Keep Pets Warm
detail: Use sweaters, jackets, and warm bedding to protect your pet from cold weather.

title: Moisturize Paws
detail: Apply pet-safe paw balm to prevent cracks during winter.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
detail: Avoid long exposure to cold wind, snow, or icy surfaces.

title: Provide Warm Meals
detail: Slightly warm food and fresh water help maintain body temperature.
